item.description:
Let's go try a new location for bowling this month.  Leo's Superbowl has been entertaining people for years, lets go have some fun!  They have a great menu and also serve beer and wine.  So come have some fun with friends and check out a new place for bowling.

Note, Glow bowling starts at 9:00pm, we will start off regular bowling then get glowing.  Should be fun to see what the differce our scores are. lol

Cost:

  • $2.00 per pair of rental shoes

  • Bowling: $4.00 per person/game. Glow bolwing starting at 9:15pm: $26.00 per hour per lane, pro-rated by the minute

Depending how many people sign up we will split up as fair as possible.  To be more festive try to wear something that will GLOW in the dark.

Remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811.

If you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  Thank you for paying your dues.

In the events that your plans change come back to the site and change your RSVP.

Looking forward to seeing you at this event!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside come in and find us.
item.name: Candlepin Bowling
